prerequisites.supportedUseCase: Shows AWS resources like EC2, ENI, EBS, RDS and Lamba functions in your environment and their related metrics across these accounts.

widgets.title: Number of Active EC2 Instances by Account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_instance with active=true as e
return e.tag.AccountName as name, count(e) as value

widgets.title: Recently terminated EC2 instances by account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_instance with state='terminated' as i
return i.tag.AccountName as x, count(i) as y

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_eni as e
return e.tag.AccountName as name, count(e) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_eni as e that !USES (Host|Gateway|Function|Database|Cluster|Task)
return e.tag.AccountName as x, count(e) as y

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_ebs_volume as v that !uses aws_instance
return v.tag.AccountName as x, count(v) as y

widgets.title: EBS Snapshots shared with another account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_ebs_snapshot with shared=true as ebs
return ebs._type as x, count(ebs) as y

widgets.title: EBS Snapshots shared publicly with everyone

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_ebs_snapshot with public=true as ebs
return count(ebs) as value

widgets.title: Number of S3 buckets by account

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND aws_s3_bucket as bkt
RETURN
  bkt.tag.AccountName AS name,
  count(bkt) AS value

widgets.title: Number of lambda functions by Runtime

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_lambda_function as f
Return
  f.runtime as name,
  count(f) as value

widgets.title: Number of lambda functions by VPC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_lambda_function as f (that HAS aws_subnet)? that (CONTAINS|HAS) aws_vpc as v
Return
v.name as name,
count(f) as value

widgets.title: Number of Lambda Functions not connected to a VPC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_lambda_function with vpcId=undefined or vpcId='' as f
Return
f.tag.AccountName as name,
count(f) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find aws_db_instance as i
return i.dbInstanceClass as x, count(i) as y

widgets.title: Production RDS instances count by cluster name

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
Find aws_rds_cluster with tag.Production=true as c 
that contains aws_db_instance as i
return c.displayName as name, count(i) as value

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
find * with _class!='AccessPolicy' 
that ASSIGNED AccessRole 
that ASSIGNED AccessPolicy 
that ALLOWS as rule Account 
where rule.permission='FULL_CONTROL'
return tree
